location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 823 of 1866 from Charles Gonne, Secretary to Government, Political Department, Bombay Castle to Lieutenant-Colonel Lewis Pelly, Political Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: Brief letter acknowledging receipt of Pelly's letter No. 14 and approving the instructions which Pelly had given to the officer in charge of local duties at Maskat [Muscat].
